Package universum.studios.android.fragment.manage

Provides classes that may be used to simplify management of Fragments in an Android application, mainly theirs showing/changing/hiding.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FragmentController.OnBackStackChangeListener
    Listener that may be used to receive a callback about changes in the fragments back stack.
    FragmentController.OnRequestListener
    Listener that may be used to receive callback about executed FragmentRequest.
    FragmentFactory
    FragmentFactory specifies an interface for factories that may be attached to FragmentController in order to provide fragment instances with theirs corresponding TAGs for that controller.
    FragmentRequestInterceptor
    Interface that may be used to intercept a specific FragmentRequest when it is being executed via its associated FragmentController.
    FragmentTransition
    FragmentTransition provides a foursome of animation resources that are meant for FragmentTransaction.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseFragmentFactory
    A FragmentFactory base implementation that may be used for fragment factories used across Android application project.
    FragmentController
    FragmentController class is designed primarily to simplify Fragments management within an Android application.
    FragmentItem
    Item that is used by BaseFragmentFactory to instantiate new fragments that has been specified via @FactoryFragment annotation.
    FragmentRequest
    A request that may be used to replace|add|remove|show|hide|attach|detach a desired Fragment in a view hierarchy.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    FragmentRequest.Transaction
    Defines an annotation for determining available transaction types for FragmentRequest.transaction(int) method.

Package universum.studios.android.fragment.manage Description

Provides classes that may be used to simplify management of Fragments in an Android application, mainly theirs showing/changing/hiding.
Author:
Martin Albedinsky
